system.description:
An ooze is an amorphous or mutable creature, usually mindless.

Features: 10-sided Hit Dice; base attack bonus equal to Â¾ total Hit Dice (as cleric); no good saving throws. Most oozes are mindless and gain no skill points or feats.

Traits: Oozes eat and breathe, but do not sleep; proficient with natural weapons only; not subject to critical hits or flanking; immunity to poison, sleep, paralysis, polymorph, and stunning; blind but have blindsight; mindless (no Intelligence score, immunity to mind-affecting effects).
